content.question: Ais te...cupere cognoscere (line 1) is translated

choices.label: you said that he has learned what you want
you say that he is learning what you want
you said that you would want to learn
you say that you want to learn

content.answer: you say that you want to learn

unit.text: 2: Pliny's Letters: Eruption of Mt. Vesuvius

skill.text: 1.B: Describe how grammar contributes to the meaning and function of Latin words and phrases in context.
